Serializable
public class PlotBand
extends Object
implements Serializable

Defines a colored band across a grid chart.

Author:
Tom Hombergs (tom.hombergs@gmail.com)
See Also:
http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#Axis.plotBands, Serialized Form
